dc_description_s: Town of Brookline building footprints. This data layer is from Boston Edison Company (BECo.). The original aerial photography was flown between 1990 and 1991 at 1" =600’ negative scale. Digital planmetric data meets National Map Accuracy Standards for 1"=100’ mapping.Street addresses have been added to the building footprints layer by Camp Dresser McKee, Inc. in 1996, based upon the addresses on the Assessor’s map sheets.
dc_publisher_s: Brookline (MA) Geographic Information System (City of Brookline GIS)
